Package ca.caro.assetmanagement.database

Class ReportHandler

java.lang.Object
ca.caro.assetmanagement.database.ReportHandler
public class ReportHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Report Handler Class

Class that handles the SQL related to request from Report page. Methods includes SELECT from database base on criteria sent to it.

    • getFullAssetsInCSV

      public java.lang.String getFullAssetsInCSV()
      It connects to database and performs SQL to select all asset with great details by joining multiple table, then parse the result into one String in CSV pattern
      Returns:
      String of result of all asset with greater details in CSV pattern

    • getFullAssetsDynamicInCSV

      public java.lang.String getFullAssetsDynamicInCSV​(java.lang.StringBuffer selectClause, java.lang.StringBuffer whereClause, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      It connects to database and performs SQL to select asset with specific details bases on input by joining multiple table, then parse the result into one String in CSV pattern.
      Parameters:
      selectClause - the "SELECT" clause in SQL, it controls the number of columns being executed in SQL statement
      whereClause - the "WHERE" clause in SQL, it controls the condition executed in SQL statement.
      request - the HTTP request allowing the method to set attributes in requestScope
      response - the HTTP response
      Returns:
      String of result of asset with specific details in CSV pattern
